body_html:
Thanks for your responses
I tried but the result is still the same.

It seems like it's more like a bug about cv2 with cuda or ubuntu (maybe because) than with pytorch
I use PIL instead now to the job instead of cv2 and not it runs successfully.
I think this issue can be closed or if you want me to test more, I am willing to try.

body:
Thanks for your responses
I tried but the result is still the same.

It seems like it's more like a bug about cv2 with cuda or ubuntu (maybe because) than with pytorch
I use PIL instead now to the job instead of cv2 and not it runs successfully.
I think this issue can be closed or if you want me to test more, I am willing to try.
